mapper.insert: insert into book_table(bookCounts, bookTitle, bookAdmin, bookWriter, bookPublisher, bookPublicationDate, bookIntroduceContents ,bookPrice, bookCreatedDate, bookFileName) values (#{bookCounts}, #{bookTitle}, #{bookAdmin},#{bookWriter}, #{bookPublisher},#{bookPublicationDate}, #{bookIntroduceContents}, #{bookPrice}, now(), #{bookFileName})
